commit message:
bumped min version to 11.  Updated SDK to 23.  Removed deprecated code
in showNotifications.  Made notification skull pure white.  Deleted
MMPebble code as Pebble watchface will not need companion app.

reimplemented notification using Notification.Builder.  Testing
overnight on device.

Add D_H_M_S & D_H_M, Add ONE to calendar tscales

Add days_hours_mins_secs and days_hours_mins timescales.  Calendar
timescales prefixed by 'ONE', for example 'ONE YEAR' instead of just 'YEAR.'

Add D_H_M tscale & reverse time to MM Lite

Days hours and mins now in MorbidMeter Lite.  Reverse time checkbox is
now enabled in MorbidMeter Lite.
Format properly days in D_H_M timescales

Set max death day date to 2200 in date picker

It was 2100 by default, limiting MM utily for those with longevity
lasting beyond 2100.
